name: The Heist (itch) (Peyton Breech, stevenmly, Tony_N, AMWilkes)
name_original: The Heist (itch) (Peyton Breech, stevenmly, Tony_N, AMWilkes)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Mouse - Move Camera

Collect as many moneybags before the time runs out! Keep trying to improve your score or get the fastest time you can!
